name: com.unity.charactercontroller
description:
This package provides a customizable character controller solution for Entities. 

 Navigate to the "Samples" tab in order to download the "Standard Characters", which serve as a starting point for implementing your own characters.

samples.description: Starter assets for first-person and third-person characters

_upm.changelog:
### Changed
* Updated package dependencies
* Updated Standard Characters (samples) to use com.unity.inputsystem package by default.
